feature1.explanation: Both texts exhibit informal punctuation styles with the use of hyphens, commas, and informal language overall.

feature2.explanation: The lexical and grammatical features in both texts show similarities in informal language and word choice.

feature3.explanation: Both texts display similar sentence structures with medium complexity and coherence.

feature4.explanation: The text and discourse features are consistent in the informal tone and narrative styles used in both paragraphs.

feature5.explanation: No significant spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the similarities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate.
